Articles.Content:
crafts that don't have enough twr to be launched from tylo can be launched horizontally. by this method you can avoid falling by standing on ground and reach enough speed that way. also you don't spend much of your thrust to defeat gravity.

i tried it but couldn't do it. hardest thing is bumps on road. i couldn't find a flat surface on tylo.

there must be someone did it before but i can't find any thread about it.

Edited October 19, 2016 by rdem

Hazard-ish did it as part of the Single Tank to Tylo video, at 5:00.

https://youtu.be/w8wm2zaILzE?t=5m
